entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe.dll is missing building runtime/libs with VS2022 #62064
  • Interop ComWrappersTests failures #62063
  • Stream.ReadLineAsync is 6 times slower than Stream.ReadLine in .NET 6 #62061
  • UnwindManagedExceptionPass1 crashes on virtual dispatch stub when handling System.NullReferenceException on macOS ARM64 #62058
  • Analyzer/fixer proposal: Collapse multiple `Path.Combine` or `Path.Join` in a row #62057
  • Blazor WASM crashes after a time with Assertion: should not be reached at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/mini/../sgen/sgen-scan-object.h:91 558006 @ dotnet.6.0.0.csqdfrwtlv.js:1 #62054
  • [mono][bug] mono_alc_from_gchandle return wrong value? #62052
  • `DispatchProxy` cannot work with types from collectible assemblies. #62050
  • Forward substitution for relops can create new data races #62048
  • Found conflicts between different versions of "System.Security.Principal.Windows" that could not be resolved. #62044
  • Deadlock with SystemEvents when application is shutdown by Restart Manager #62042
  • JIT doesn't inline methods contain EH code #62038
  • PrincipalContext.Dispose() does not dispose LdapConnection(s) used by PrincipalContext.ValidateCredentials() #62035
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.Directory_Delete_str_bool.Unix_NotFoundDirectory_ReadOnlyVolume #62034
  • Remove Spaces from GitHub Labels #62032
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Directed/debugging/debuginfo/tester/tester.sh #62031

Closed

  • DriveInfo tests fail if current user uses SUBST #14027
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Support for MultiSet & MultiMap in System.Collections.Generic #61892
  • Test failure JIT\\Directed\\debugging\\poisoning\\poison\\poison.cmd #62033
  • coreclr_initialize returns 0x80070057 on Windows when using '/' directory separators #13195
    Future
  • [Bug] MAUI templates crashing on iOS (Foundation.NSMutableData:AppendBytes) #61153
    6.0.x
  • Add RequiresDynamicCodeAttribute #61239
    7.0.0
  • comma as decimal stopped working #60938
  • Logger Generator not able to Resolve Generic Type Constraints #62026
  • EnvironmentVariablesConfigurationProvider not load connection string prefix POSTGRESQLCONNSTR_ on Azure AppService #57545
    7.0.0
  • X509v3 Subject Alternative Name DirName #61998
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix miscellaneous typos #62062
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Sync shared code from aspnetcore #62059
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Exclude a newly added test on Mono #62056
  • [mono][interp] Remove hack for nint/nfloat #62053
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Flip IL offset check #62049
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • #61971 - Fix a bug causing EventCounter to fire twice on linux #62047
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Add Browsable Attribute support. #62045
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Stop marking volatile indirections as `NO_CSE` #62043
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • make sure OpenSSL is initialized before Tls13Supported code runs #62037
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Dispose LdapConnections used by PrincipalContext.ValidateCredentials #62036
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution

Merged

  • Re-enable Windows test that verifies DriveInfo.VolumeLabel setter fails on SUBST'd drive #59850
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Integration of changes in shared files from runtimelab/NativeAOT #62039
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add a github action to sync shared source from aspnetcore #61999
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono][interp] Fix handing of native types #61612
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm] debug with modularized runtime(s) #61848
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Update path of disabled test that was moved #62051
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • Fix FileSystemAclExtensions.Create when passing a null FileSecurity #61297
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • PE loader/image investigations #61938
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Suppress trim warning caused by recent attribute removal changes #62023
    area-System.ComponentModel, linkable-framework, 7.0.0
  • Remove string allocation from XmlTextEncoder.WriteCharEntity #61774
    area-System.Xml, needs more info, community-contribution
  • [Wasm] JS modularization #61313
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • WIP: first group project for type generator tests 0-99 #61942
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Stepping into hidden function. #61312
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Don't merge CI test only] #61970
  • Support Process.Start() on MacCatalyst #61507
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Build HttpStress and SslStress with live-built runtime using current TFM #61689
    area-System.Net
  • CI matrix change: add Windows.Server.Core.20H2 - Second attempt #60054
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Use cross origin policy headers #62016
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • CI matrix update: add Ubuntu 21.04 - second attempt #60162
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix change: add Windows Server 2022 #60163
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix change: Add OSX 12 arm #59085
    blocked, area-Infrastructure
  • CI matrix: add openSUSE 15.2 - second attempt #60161
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [JIT] [Issue: 61620] Optimizing ARM64 for *x = dblCns; #61847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Feature/get debug view value processing #60391
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Reduce allocations in code generated by Logging generators (#61162) #62011
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [Mono] Fix support for nested structs with explicit layout #61467
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono]mono_runtime_delegate_invoke change to gc unsafe state #62003
    community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Fix and optimize llvmonly+gsharedvt code generation #61117
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add zlib-ng library, optimized for ARM64 #61883
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • Start building a universal System.Linq.Expressions library #61952
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • SPMI no ASMDiff between Checked and Release #61335
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Use workloads to run AOT tests #61863
    arch-wasm
  • fix for excessive gen0 in high memory load situation #61884
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix setting pipe used in PAL_ProbeMemory as nonblocking #61126
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Fix VNs for method table fetched from newobj #1128
  • Occasional SEHException in ObjWriter #1316
  • NativeAOT compiler fails from VS command prompt #1674

PullRequests

Merged

  • Merge from dotnet/runtime #1753

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] lower args using PUTARG_TYPE #1744

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Io.Serial Appears Broken on Manjaro #22783
  • SDK 3.1.415: dotnet doesn't work on MacOs 10.13 (High Sierra) #22782
  • [BUG] Version downgrade in .NET 6 for Microsoft.VisualBasic.Core.dll leads to broken Microsoft Installers #22773
  • Dotnet New isnt working #22771
  • Allow `dotnet new console -tf net472` to specify target framework of the new project #22769

Closed

  • Publishing trimmed console app prints a message which warns about trimming #22518

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #22780
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Test project XunitMulti to current framework #22770
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Remove expected warning from linker test as it's no longer expected. #22760
    Area-ILLink
  • Change messages for ILLink #22636
    Area-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #22766
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update Test project x64SolutionBuild to current framework #22532
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incremental source generator hint name issue #57991
  • why can't the source generator be used in the net6.0? #57990
  • Crash while editing Syntax.xml #57987

PullRequests

Created

  • Change nullable annotation on CopyAnnotationsTo() #57992
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix placement of trivia inside an interpolation #57989
    Area-Compilers
  • Simplify creation of interpolation text tokens. #57988
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57984
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main into features/rawstringliterals #57981
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57986
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update OneOffInsertion.ps1 file path #57985
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57993
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • List patterns: Skip compiler-generated dag nodes for better codegen #57909
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Use !! in AddParameterCheck refactoring #57934
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify 'interpolation' data, and move to an easier to consume System.Range approach for it #57966
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Method group conversion caching redo #57882
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Read SourceLink info and call service to retrieve source from there #57978
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Use runtime type arguments for lsp jsonrpc request handling #57834
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ability to cache pages with antiforgery forms? #38642
  • ASP.NET Core 6 with Scaffolding in linux #38640
  • Blazor DynamicComponent does not pass parameters to component if case does not match #38635
  • Allow Blacklist mode for HttpLoggingMiddleware for logging Headers. #38634
  • OperationCanceledException not re-throw in SystemTextJsonOutputFormatter.WriteResponseBodyAsync with selectedEncoding is utf-8 #38633

Closed

  • Perf improvement: json #38626
  • Perf improvement: single_query #38641
  • ASPNETCORE_URLS is being ignored in .NET 6 + React Template #38631
  • Razor page not escaping @ in attributes #38595
    Backlog
  • Blazor+WASM+Static hosting: Is the advice to use a fallback Brotli decoder correct? #38587
  • Blazor WebAssembly Hosted w/Individual Accounts does not work published to IIS. Multiple issues won't load. #38589
  • Razor component wrong format. #38603
  • Unable to pack .NET 6 blazorserver as dotnet tool #38620
  • [Feature Request] - Add Support for rendering Render Fragment / Component into string #38622
  • net6.0: Runtime error: invokeJSFromDotNet creating HostBuilder #38625
  • Blazor performance with a large data set #38636
  • Upgrade to .net 6.0 broke styles in Identity MVC pages #38637
  • Blazor issue with new DotNetStreamReference in net6 #38618
  • {action} as parameter in GET route does not work - 404 #38615
  • Replace coverage for Blazor wasm standalone individual auth #28596
    7.0-preview1
  • Authentication failure - return a message to the user? #38617
  • Perf regression: mvc #38627
  • Error using Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchangeRedis 6.0.0 #38606
  • SignalR Java Library method "On" not calling error when class type has wrong parameters #38593
  • ScopedServices property of OwningComponentBase may not be disposed. #38424

PullRequests

Created

  • Support Custom Classes for ValidationMessage #38639
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Updated

  • Improve building ASP.NET Core directly on arm64 machines #38527
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Upgrade Playwright #38414
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 7.0-preview1

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet-dump` System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: Specified argument was out of the range of valid values. #2767
  • `dotnet-gcdump` System.ApplicationException: ETL file shows the start of a heap dump but not its completion. #2766

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unit test projects can't reference Maui multi target projects #3552
  • VS 17.1.0 Preview 1.1 is using the complete absolute Path for BundleResources for SmartCopy Task for iOS #3551
  • Namespace names in MAUI. #3548

Closed

  • .NET Maui Custom Handlers not working, official docs is wrong? #3550
  • BlazorWebView WPF/WinForms build targets are not in NUPKG #3533
    6.0.200-preview.11

PullRequests

Merged

  • [iOS, Windows, Android] Button border properties #3411
    area/controls 🎮
  • BlazorWebView WPF/WinForms build targets need to go into NUPKG #3532
    area/blazor 🕸️

Updated

  • Update Essentials Screenshot API, capture native frames. #3529
    partner/ui-tools, area/essentials 🍞
  • Setup first set of Automation Properties #3222
    area/a11y
  • Move most of the types in the Platform folder to the Platform namespaces #3495
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • Provide a Date? so that Date can have a null value for UI elements to make it easier when user does not select a date #2306
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Call to change tracker changes unchanged many to many relationship to deleted #26831
  • How to update an entity with collection property that has either new, updated or deleted entities? #26830
  • Lazy load works incorrectly if property set is executed before the first load #26829
  • How to dealing with multy source Database using DbContext #26828
  • Nullable reference with DeleteBehavior.Cascade that is deleted is reloaded back after DetectChanges #26827
  • Whether to support, object association entity table #26826
  • The LINQ expression could not be translated after upgrading from EF Core 5 to EF Core 6 #26825

PullRequests

Updated

  • Suppress warnings on uninitialized DbSet properties #26795
  • Automatic refactorings based on static analysis of EFCore project #26806
  • Case sensitive parameters 18861 #26287
  • [release/2.1] Move off expiring machine pools #26794
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • .NET 6.0 installation location is missing on installation wizard within a clean Windows OS #12722
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, installer, .NET 7.0.1xx SDK, validation-installer-.NET 7.0.1xx SDK #installer-108968-.NET7.0.1xxSDK #11997
